values:
I was talking to my old best friend from Toronto; I miss him.I've grown apart from all my friends there; and to be quite honest it makes me upset. Funny enough; that just set in; that we've grown apart. I don't know; I really don't know anymore. Are certain friendships meant to end? Or do they just end because of silly circumstances like distance? 



I really don't know anymore; about anything. I really want to get close with them again; and patch up the rifts but will it be possible? Only time can really tell I suppose. No one ever told me that life would ever be this unfair. That I'd loose great friends, or find a love that lives half way across the planet. Maybe there just tests from God or the greater being thats out there, to see if I'll work hard for what I want.



Well I want this, and I want her;
so here it goes.

We're back together and I'm the happiest I've been in such a long time.

I can't really write how I'm feeling because words simply cannot describe it.  Maybe you'll be able to tell by the dreamy look in my eyes and that my walk, and each and every step I take is filled with new meaning.

There's nothing but us anymore.
I love you Gia.



Sleep with your head against the sky tonight.

School officially sucks.
But that was pretty obvious from the start.

I really need to catch up on my reading;when I say that I mean DECENT BOOKS.
That have good plots and characters. I also need some NEW music because I am infinitely bored with my selection. I should start listening to '77 punk and riot grrrrrrl again.

I'm going to have to start applying for Universities soon. Top 3 choices are;

A) Mac Master University
B) University of Toronto (ERINDALE CAMPUS)
C) York University

Should I apply to the Royal Military College? Maybe; I'm not sure about that yet though. I really should start doing my homework. Ah. I feel lonely; my mom is sick and sleeping whilst I am alone in my basement. Someone come visit me now!!!

If you know of any good books; list them PLEASE!

Peace.

PS.
Thanks dAno for finally giving me the Naruto link. I actually like it; except for Sakura. I'm glad your writing a Fan Fiction about her dying; maybe I can make a guest appearance where I punch her in the stomach and make her eat her own eyeballs. I think that would officially make you're story the best!


Apparently I have -no freaking idea how to do an LJ cut so I will wait for dAno's instruction.

Funny moment.

My mother and I were watching TV the scary Burger King Man came on. I said that I was extremely frightened of him and would be deathly scared if he showed up in my room one night. My mother proceeds to say;

"Don't worry dear; I'd come in you're room and smack him up and say stop bugging my Zainabeeee"

She is so funny when she isn't grumpy
